translations: [水运] 商船队队长；提督技能

sentences.sentence: The guilty men in this episode were gutless admirals.
sentences.translation: 这段往事中真正有罪的是那些怯懦的海军将领。

sentences.sentence: Peccati Syn was one of the twelve original Grand Admirals of the Imperial Navy.
sentences.translation: 佩卡蒂·西恩曾是帝国海军的初代十二元帅之一。

sentences.sentence: The Soviet admirals wanted to make it versatile and arm it with any possible weapons.
sentences.translation: 苏联将领希望使之通用，尽可能地装配武器。
